results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: በአላህና በአጋንንት መካከልም ዝምድናን አደረጉ፡፡ አጋንንትም እነርሱ (ይህን ባዮች በእሳት) የሚጣዱ መሆናቸውን በእርግጥ ዐውቀዋል፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: ግን የተመረጡት የአላህ ባሮች (በአላህ ላይ አይዋሹም)፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
